annotations.description: The Third Installment of our cocktail Workshop, and tools explanation, and hangout! ==== DETAILED DESCRIPTION ==== If you like our channel, please click and ...
annotations.title: Barfly Workshop #3

textContent:
Half a lime quartered
Barspoon sugar
.5 oz Simple Syrup
1 oz gin
1.5 oz Campari

Muddle lime and sugars together in tin
Whip shake with liquors
Pour into rocks glass and top with crushed ice

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=98GJbTlYLCM
title: Camparinha
